name: paraphernalia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
all the objects needed for or connected with a particular activity: We sell pots, gloves, seeds and other gardening paraphernalia. Bags of cocaine and all sorts of drug paraphernalia were seized at the airport. Synonyms
accoutrements formal
apparatus (EQUIPMENT)
equipment
gadgetry
gear
tackle (EQUIPMENT)Compare
appurtenance formal

a collection of objects, esp. equipment needed for or connected with a particular activity: photography paraphernalia
